description: The Book Manufacturers Institute, a trade association for book printers and their suppliers in North America, is joining the industry's fight against book bans. Through the "BMI Challenge," the association is encouraging its 110 members donate to We Are Stronger Than Censorship, an initiative cosponsored by the Independent Book Publishers Association and EveryLibrary Institute; if members raise $16,000, BMI will match that sum with its own $16,000 donation.
title: Anti–book banning initiative gets industry support
